params:
visuals
node
ctx
propX
propY
side

4.text:
handle = {
    element: node,
    type: "skewer-resizer",
    side: side,
    x: x,
    y: y,
    id: node.id,
    startX: x,
    startY: y,
    minY: y,
    maxY: y,
    propX: propX,
    propY: propY
}

8.text:
handle.minX = node.x + config.minWidth /
2
handle.maxX = node.x + big

6.text:
handle.minX = node.x - big
handle.maxX = node.x - config.minWidth /
2

name: skewerResizer
